org.flowvisor.config

Interface ConfDBSettings

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfDBHandler

    public interface ConfDBSettings
    As FV doesn't mandate that derby be the only repository type, we define this interface to enforce that no matter what the data repository is the behaviour of FV will not be modified. In theory, of course.
    Author:
    ash
